TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Plmwan, title = Plmwan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plmwan} }

S.FORM: Plmwan Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Plmwan a niyaro', 36 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 137 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 133 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal93%, Amis1%, Paiwan1%, Saysiyat1%, roma1%.

Plmwan Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Plmwan a niyaro', 36 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 137 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 133 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal93%, Amis1%, Paiwan1%, Saysiyat1%, roma1%.
